mapper.select: select id,info_id,cheque_num,worker,modifier_date,item_num,payment_num, ammeter_num,payment_total,isAccount,station_type, agreement_price,area,network_identity,station_num,station_name, machine_room,machine_QR,payment_period,befor_payment_date,last_ammeter_num, now_ammeter_num,reality_report_num,last_check_ammeter,now_check_ammeter,multiple, form_price,finance_price,finance_expend_money,electricity_num_a,electricity_num_b, electricity_num_c,electricity_num_d,electricity_num_price,move_account_money,returned_money_count, gross_margin,ammeter_type,ammeter_discern_num,ammeter_state,station_state, ammeter_address,affiliation_company,rent_company,linkman,phone, gathering_company,machine_room_address,tenement_address,remark,affirm_pact_money, balance_date,contract_date,income_date,is_invoice,contract_num, invoice_type,tax_rate,tax_money,invoice_num,creat_time from ammeter_info GROUP BY creat_time ORDER BY creat_time DESC LIMIT 0,5;
